file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-32-05-04 - DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the DC-to-DC converter of the CD player. B. The DC-to-DC converter is installed in the forward galley, zone 232. C. To do these procedures, use AMM TASK 23-32-05-000-801-A/400 and AMM TASK 23-32-05-400-801-A/400 or AMM TASK 23-32-05-000-802-A/400 and AMM TASK 23-32-05-400-802-A/400, as applicable. D. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-000-801-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-400-801-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-000-802-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-400-802-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-000-803-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL EMB-145 ACFT MODEL(S) 23-32-05-400-803-A DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION EMB-145 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 1 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the DC-to-DC converter. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley H. Preparation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-006-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) Remove the screws (2) that attach the door (3) to the forward galley (1). (3) Remove the door (3). (4) Pull and hold the table lock (14). (5) Pull the table (15) and remove it from the forward galley (1). (6) Remove the shroud (13) to get access to the screw (10). (7) Remove the screw (10) that attaches the CD player compartment (7) to the forward galley (1). (8) Open the door (9) to get access to the screw (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 2 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (9) Remove the screw (11) that attaches the CD player compartment (7) to the forward galley (1). (10) Remove the screw (6) and washer (5). (11) Carefully pull the CD player compartment (7) to get access to the audio connector (12) and electrical connector (4). (12) Disconnect the audio connector (12) and the electrical connector (4) from the CD player (8). (13) Remove the CD player compartment (7) from the forward galley (1) to get access to the DC-to-DC converter (17). I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-006-A (1) Remove the screws (19) and washers (18) that attach the terminal lugs (20) to the DC- to-DC converter (17). (2) Remove the screws (16) that attach the DC-to-DC converter (17) to the forward galley (1). (3) Remove the DC-to-DC converter (17). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 3 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

+ - + - AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 DC-to-DC Converter - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONE B 232 20. TERMINAL 19. SCREW (4) LUG (4) A 18. WASHER (4) 17. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER 16. SCREW (4) 2. SCREW (3) 1. FORWARD C GALLEY DET. A 3. DOOR 4. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 6. SCREW (3) DET. C 5. WASHER (3) D 7. CD PLAYER COMPARTMENT 8. CD PLAYER 10. SCREW 12. AUDIO CONNECTOR 9. DOOR 11. SCREW 15. TABLE 14. TABLE 13. SHROUD VIEW D LOCK DET. B 145AMM230212.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 4 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 3. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the DC-to-DC converter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-006-A (1) Put the DC-to-DC converter (17) in position. (2) Install the screws (16) to attach the DC-to-DC converter (17) to the forward galley (1). (3) Put the terminal lugs (20) in position. (4) Install the screws (19) and washers (18) to attach the terminal lugs (20) to the DC-to- DC converter (17). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 5 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on (Figure 401) SUBTASK 842-006-A (1) Connect the audio connector (12) and the electrical connector (4) to the CD player (8). (2) Carefully put the CD player compartment (7) into the forward galley (1). (3) Install the screw (11) to attach the CD player compartment (7) to the forward galley (1). (4) Install the screw (10). (5) Install the screw (6) and washer (5). (6) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (7) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-245) Do the CD player model DEH-245 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (8) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1000) Do the CD player model DEH-1000 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (9) Install the shroud (13). (10) Pull and hold the table lock (14). (11) Put the table (15) into the forward galley (1). (12) Put the door (3) in position. (13) Install the screws (2) that attach the door (3) to the forward galley (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 6 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 4. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the DC-to-DC converter. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley H. Preparation (Figure 402) SUBTASK 841-007-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers listed below and attach a DO- NOT-CLOSE tag to them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) Open the door (9). (3) Remove the screws (4) and washers (3) that attach the CD player compartment (6) to the forward galley (1). (4) Remove the screws (8) that attach the CD player compartment (6) to the forward galley (1). (5) Carefully pull the CD player compartment (6) to get access to the audio connector (7) and electrical connector (2). (6) Disconnect the audio connector (7) and the electrical connector (2) from the CD player (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 7 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (7) Remove the CD player compartment (6) from the forward galley (1) to get access to the DC-to-DC converter (11). I. Removal (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-007-A (1) Remove the screws (13) and washers (12) that attach the terminal lugs (14) to the DC- to-DC converter (11). (2) Remove the screws (10) that attach the DC-to-DC converter (11) to the forward galley (1). (3) Remove the DC-to-DC converter (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 8 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

+ - + - AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 DC-to-DC Converter - Removal/Installation Figure 402 ZONE B 232 14. TERMINAL A 13. SCREW (4) LUG (4) 12. WASHER (4) 11. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER 10. SCREW (4) DET. A C 1. FORWARD GALLEY DET. C 2. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 3. WASHER (2) 4. SCREW (2) 8. SCREW (2) 7. AUDIO 9. DOOR CONNECTOR 6. CD PLAYER 5. CD PLAYER COMPARTMENT DET. B 145AMM230214.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 9 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 5. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the DC-to-DC converter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Installation (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-007-A (1) Put the DC-to-DC converter (11) in position. (2) Install the screws (10) to attach the DC-to-DC converter (11) to the forward galley (1). (3) Put the terminal lugs (14) in position. (4) Install the screws (13) and washer (12) to attach the terminal lugs (14) to the DC-to-DC converter (11). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 10 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on (Figure 402) SUBTASK 842-007-A (1) Connect the audio connector (7) and the electrical connector (2) to the CD player (5). (2) Carefully put the CD player compartment (6) into the forward galley (1). (3) Install the screws (8) that attach the CD player compartment (5) to the forward galley (1). (4) Install the screws (4) and washers (3) that attach the CD player compartment (6) to the forward galley (1). (5) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (6) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-245) Do the CD player model DEH-245 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (7) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1000) Do the CD player model DEH-1000 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (8) Close the door (9). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 11 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-000-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 6. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the removal of the DC-to-DC converter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 26-14-02-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Preparation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 841-008-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (2) Remove the screw (4) and washer (5) that attach the support (6) to the forward galley (1). (3) Remove the support (6). (4) Carefully remove the shroud (12). (5) Open the door (13). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 12 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (6) Pull the waste container (11) and remove it from the forward galley (1). (7) Open the door (16) to get access to the Smoke Detector Panel (7). (8) Remove the Smoke Detector Panel (7) (AMM TASK 26-14-02-000-801-A/400). (9) Remove the screws (2) that attach the magnetic catch (3) to the forward galley (1). (10) Remove the magnetic catch (3). (11) Remove the screws (15) that attach the CD player compartment (9) to the forward galley (1). (12) Carefully pull the CD player compartment (9) to get access to the audio connector (14) and electrical connector (8). (13) Disconnect the audio connector (14) and the electrical connector (8) from the CD player (10). (14) Remove the CD player compartment (9) from the forward galley (1) to get access to the DC-to-DC converter (18). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-008-A (1) Remove the screws (20) and washers (19) that attach the terminal lugs (21) to the DC- to-DC converter (18). (2) Remove the screws (17) that attach the DC-to-DC converter (18) to the forward galley (1). (3) Remove the DC-to-DC converter (18). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 13 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

+ - + - OUTPUT OUT T/C OUT AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 DC-to-DC Converter - Removal/Installation Figure 403 ZONE 20. SCREW (4) 21. TERMINAL 232 LUG (4) A 19. WASHER (4) B 18. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER 17. SCREW (4) 1. FORWARD GALLEY C 2. SCREW (2) DET. A 3. MAGNETIC CATCH ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR (REF.) 4. SCREW (2) DET. C 5. WASHER (2) 6. SUPPORT 16. DOOR 7. SMOKE DETECTOR SCREW (4) 9. CD PLAYER (REF.) COMPARTMENT 8. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 15. SCREW (4) 14. AUDIO CONNECTOR 10. CD PLAYER 11. WASTE CONTAINER 13. DOOR 12. SHROUD DET. B 145AMM230211.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-803-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 14 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. SMOKE DETECTOR HORN RESET

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-32-05-400-803-A EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 7. DC-TO-DC CONVERTER - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures for the installation of the DC-to-DC converter. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500 - AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500 - AMM TASK 26-14-02-400-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-008-A (1) Put the DC-to-DC converter (18) in position. (2) Install the screws (17) to attach the DC-to-DC converter (18) to the forward galley (1). (3) Put the terminal lugs (21) in position. (4) Install the screws (20) and washer (19) to attach the terminal lugs (21) to the DC-to-DC converter (18). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 15 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on (Figure 401) SUBTASK 842-008-A (1) Connect the audio connector (14) and the electrical connector (8) to the CD player (10). (2) Carefully put the CD player compartment (9) into the forward galley (1). (3) Install the screws (15) that attach the CD player compartment (9) to the forward galley (1). (4) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers listed below and remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tag from them: • MUSIC (Location Tip: SHED DC BUS 1/SERVICE/MUSIC). • PA (Location Tip: ESSENTIAL DC BUS 2/COMM/PA). (5) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-245) Do the CD player model DEH-245 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-801-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-802-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (6) (Aircraft with CD player model DEH-1000) Do the CD player model DEH-1000 operational test (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-804-A/500) or (AMM TASK 23-32-00-700-805-A/500, if you turn on the CD player with the SOURCE pushbutton). (7) Install the Smoke Detector Panel (7) (AMM TASK 26-14-02-400-801-A/400). (8) Put the magnetic catch (3) in position. (9) Install the screws (2) to attach the magnetic catch (3) to the forward galley (1). (10) Put the waste container (11) into the forward galley (1). (11) Install the shroud (12). (12) Put the support (6) in position. (13) Install the screws (4) and washers (5) to attach the support (6) to the forward galley (1). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-803-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-32-05 Page 16 of 16 Rev 49 - Feb 16/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
